DOC.brief_summary: The study design Open-Label，Randomized , Single-Dose , 2-way Crossover Bioequivalence Study . During session , subject administer single dose 250mg Gefitinib Tablet ( one Gefitinib Tablet 250mg Hunan Kelun one Iressa® Tablet 250mg AstraZeneca ) fast condition .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Gefitinib Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-Label，Randomized , Single-Dose , 2-way Crossover Bioequivalence Study . During session , subject randomly assign 1:1 ratio receive single 250-mg dose either test formulation ( Hunam Kelun ) reference formulation ( Iressa® Astrazeneca ) , vice versa , 21-day washout period administration period .
